ComicInfo.Title: Monsters
ComicInfo.Summary: The second STEAMPUNK story arc begins in part 1 of the 3-part "Mechanica Sundown"! Cole Blaquesmith sets out with his ragged gang of steampunks, seeking to fill in the gaps of his memory so that he can find the weapon that will surely mean Absinthe's destruction.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-18 01:22:04. [CVDB70253] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev78 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-09 05:08:00. [Issue ID 70253]
